October 2

Thank you to everyone who joined and proposed their layout for our shirt and to those who took their time to vote a choice of design. As a result of the poll, Shirt #1 by Jeter recieved 25 votes up to date and will be the shirt design for our department for this school year. We will soon post and update on how to avail.

-Must have Adventist University of the Philippines ACCESS

September 1

Good day ACCESS. As part of our department activities we'd like to open the public to submit their ideas for our department's t-shirt design.

For submission you can reply to this thread or message me directly. The selected design by the whole body will be the official shirt for this school year, so do your best!
